name: Join5
description:
A classical and addicting Match-5 game with new twists.

Move and join five or more balls of a color vertically or horizontally to destroy them. The more you destroy the more points you get. Try to survive as long as you can as the game puts new balls in awkward places after your every move. Don't waste precious turns while you try to join and destroy them.

There are three kinds of special balls and two kinds of special tiles in the game including:
Joker Ball, Flying Ball, Black Hole Tile and Bomb Tile.

In game tutorials teach you everything you need to know while you play! Don't worry, it is very easy to learn.

Use special balls and specials tiles wisely. Mastering them separates the great from the good.

Good luck!
